languages.text: {n}Вокс изрыгает водопад статического шума, но вам удается продраться сквозь него и услышать обрывки слов, произнесенные голосом, похожим на голос вашего Мастера вокса:{/n} "...фон Валанц... команд... ный шлюз..." {n}Сигнал теряется прежде, чем вы успеваете произнести хоть что-то.{/n}

{n}The vox spits out a torrent of static, through which you nonetheless manage to catch fragments of words spoken by a voice not unlike that of your Vox Master:{/n} "...von Valanc— command— rlock..." {n}The signal is lost before you manage to say anything.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс изрыгает водопад статического шума, но вам удается продраться сквозь него и услышать обрывки слов, произнесенные голосом, похожим на голос вашего Мастера вокса:{/n} "...фон Валанц... команд... ный шлюз..." {n}Сигнал теряется прежде, чем вы успеваете произнести хоть что-то.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox spits out a torrent of static, through which you nonetheless manage to catch fragments of words spoken by a voice not unlike that of your Vox Master:{/n} "...von Valanc…command...rlock..." {n}The signal is lost before you're able to say anything.{/n}

{n}The vox spits out a torrent of static, through which you nonetheless manage to catch fragments of words spoken by a voice not unlike that of your Vox Master:{/n} "...von Valanc…command...rlock..." {n}The signal is lost before you're able to say anything.{/n}

{n}The vox spits out a torrent of static, through which you nonetheless manage to catch fragments of words spoken by a voice not unlike that of your Vox Master:{/n} "...von Valanc— command— rlock..." {n}The signal is lost before you manage to say anything.{/n}

{n}The vox spits out a torrent of static, through which you nonetheless manage to catch fragments of words spoken by a voice not unlike that of your Vox Master:{/n} "...von Valanc— command— rlock..." {n}The signal is lost before you manage to say anything.{/n}

{n}The vox spits out a torrent of static, through which you nonetheless manage to catch fragments of words spoken by a voice not unlike that of your Vox Master:{/n} "...von Valanc— command— rlock..." {n}The signal is lost before you manage to say anything.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Del voco brota un torrente de estática, aunque logras escuchar trozos de palabras de una voz que podría ser la de tu maestra de vocos:{/n} «... von Valanc— mando— clusa...». {n}La señal se interrumpe antes de que logres decir nada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox spits out a torrent of static, through which you nonetheless manage to catch fragments of words spoken by a voice not unlike that of your Vox Master:{/n} "...von Valanc— command— rlock..." {n}The signal is lost before you manage to say anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Del voco brota un torrente de estática, aunque logras escuchar trozos de palabras de una voz que podría ser la de tu maestra de vocos:{/n} «... von Valanc— mando— clusa...». {n}La señal se interrumpe antes de que logres decir nada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}音阵装置传来了嘶嘶的静电声，但你还是设法捕捉到了某个与音阵大师很相似的声音。{/n}“……冯·瓦兰修……指挥官……听……”{n}你还什么都没来得及说，信号就消失了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox spits out a torrent of static, through which you nonetheless manage to catch fragments of words spoken by a voice not unlike that of your Vox Master:{/n} "...von Valanc— command— rlock..." {n}The signal is lost before you manage to say anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵装置传来了嘶嘶的静电声，但你还是设法捕捉到了某个与音阵大师很相似的声音。{/n}“……冯·瓦兰修……指挥官……听……”{n}你还什么都没来得及说，信号就消失了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスは激しい空電を吐き出したにも関わらず、ヴォクス・マスターとは違う声で話す言葉の端々が聞こえてくる。{/n}「…フォン・ヴァランシ…コマンド…ロック…」{n}何か言う前に、信号は消えてしまった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox spits out a torrent of static, through which you nonetheless manage to catch fragments of words spoken by a voice not unlike that of your Vox Master:{/n} "...von Valanc— command— rlock..." {n}The signal is lost before you manage to say anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスは激しい空電を吐き出したにも関わらず、ヴォクス・マスターとは違う声で話す言葉の端々が聞こえてくる。{/n}「…フォン・ヴァランシ…コマンド…ロック…」{n}何か言う前に、信号は消えてしまった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Vox gibt eine Sturzflut von Rauschen von sich, durch die du aber trotzdem Wortfragmente einer Stimme ausmachst, die deiner Voxmeisterin nicht unähnlich ist:{/n} "... von Valanc... Befehl ... uftschleuse ..." {n}Das Signal ist weg, bevor du etwas sagen kannst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox spits out a torrent of static, through which you nonetheless manage to catch fragments of words spoken by a voice not unlike that of your Vox Master:{/n} "...von Valanc— command— rlock..." {n}The signal is lost before you manage to say anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox gibt eine Sturzflut von Rauschen von sich, durch die du aber trotzdem Wortfragmente einer Stimme ausmachst, die deiner Voxmeisterin nicht unähnlich ist:{/n} "... von Valanc... Befehl ... uftschleuse ..." {n}Das Signal ist weg, bevor du etwas sagen kannst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dans le torrent de grésillements craché par le vox, vous parvenez à saisir des fragments de mots prononcés par une voix qui ressemble à celle de votre maîtresse-vox :{/n} « ... von Valanc... command... sas... » {n}La transmission est interrompue avant que vous n'ayez le temps de dire quoi que ce soit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox spits out a torrent of static, through which you nonetheless manage to catch fragments of words spoken by a voice not unlike that of your Vox Master:{/n} "...von Valanc— command— rlock..." {n}The signal is lost before you manage to say anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans le torrent de grésillements craché par le vox, vous parvenez à saisir des fragments de mots prononcés par une voix qui ressemble à celle de votre maîtresse-vox :{/n} « ... von Valanc... command... sas... » {n}La transmission est interrompue avant que vous n'ayez le temps de dire quoi que ce soit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Voks, cızırdamaktan başka bir şey yapmasa da arada hizmetindeki Voks Üstadı'nın sesiyle uzaktan yakından alakası olmayan birinin kelimelerini yakalamayı başarıyorsun.{/n} "Von Valan... Komuta... Hava ki..." {n}Sen tek kelime edemeden sinyal kesiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox spits out a torrent of static, through which you nonetheless manage to catch fragments of words spoken by a voice not unlike that of your Vox Master:{/n} "...von Valanc— command— rlock..." {n}The signal is lost before you manage to say anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks, cızırdamaktan başka bir şey yapmasa da arada hizmetindeki Voks Üstadı'nın sesiyle uzaktan yakından alakası olmayan birinin kelimelerini yakalamayı başarıyorsun.{/n} "…von Valan… Komuta… Hava ki…" {n}Sen tek kelime edemeden sinyal kesiliyor.{/n}
